text: wla ahd 'azlam miman akhtlq ealaa allah kdhbana, 'uwlayik syerdwn ealaa rabihim yawm alqyamt; lyhasbhm ealaa aemalhm, wayaqul al'ashhad min almalayikat walnabiiyn wghyrhm: hwla' aladhin kadhabuu ealaa rabihim fi aldunya qad sakhit allah elyhm, walaeanahum laenatan la tnqte; li'ana zalamahum sar wsfana mlazmana lhm
